feed.title: Mealient Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mealient: v0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependencies by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/172
  • Simplify network layer by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/175
  • Add linked ingredients to recipe step by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/177
  • Fix building minified variant by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/178
  • Keep screen on and update docs by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/179

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Mealient: v0.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add ACRA for crash reports by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/180
  • Display ingredient notes by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

entry.title: New release for Mealient: v0.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Add ACRA for crash reports" by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/185
  • Prepare v0.4.4 by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/186

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

entry.title: New release for Mealient: v0.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use Compose to draw the list of recipes by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/187
  • Implement sending logs to developer by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/190
  • Handle new session in log file appender by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/191
  • Ensure authentication token is always sent when it exists by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5

entry.title: New release for Mealient: v0.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Complete migration to Compose by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/194
  • Increase instructions and ingredients font size by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/195
  • Fix transition when base URL is actually incorrect by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/196
  • Fix displaying recipe ingredient note twice by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/197
  • Fix signed release build issues by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/198
  • Add Kotlinx Kover test coverage calculator by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/199
  • Update versions of dependencies by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/203
  • Add changelog by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/204
  • Attempt to fix sign action by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/205
  • Reorganize sign job by @kirmanak in https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/pull/206

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kirmanak/Mealient/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6
